Package entity

Class FlatBooking

Object
FlatBooking
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class FlatBooking extends Object implements Serializable
A booking made by an applicant for a unit in a project. The booking links an applicant, application, and project, and tracks its booking status.

  • Constructor Details

    • FlatBooking

      public FlatBooking(Application application)
      Constructs a FlatBooking object using an application, and sets up the related applicant and project. The booking is initially marked as not booked, and the applicant and project are updated accordingly.
      Parameters:
      application - The application associated with this booking.

    • isBooked

      public boolean isBooked()
      Checks if the booking has been confirmed.
      Returns:
      true if the booking is confirmed, false otherwise.

    • deleteBooking

      public void deleteBooking(Data data)
      Deletes the booking, removing the relationship between the applicant, project, and the global data.
      Parameters:
      data - The data object containing the list of all bookings.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the flat booking, displaying the details of the associated application.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A formatted string representing the booking details.
